name: TARACHINE
description:
The boy set out in search of the fruit of "TARACHINE," which is said to improve his mother's illness.
Please solve many problems and get "TARACHINE" safely.
Thank you for always playing. This time, it is a slightly longer work.
Even if you feel tired and close the game as it is, you can continue playing by selecting "Load Game" in Title. I hope you can play to the end.
